history.narrative: Law 18-235, the “Renovation Penalty Abatement Act of 2010”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 18-518, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 15, 2010, and June 29, 2010, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 19, 2010, it was assigned Act No. 18-483 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 18-235 became effective on October 15, 2010.
